וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said עַבְדֵ֨י <WH5650> 'av-Dei servants פַרְעֹ֜ה <WH6547> far-'Oh And Pharaoh's אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- to him מָתַי֙ <WH4970> ma-Tai How יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become זֶ֥ה <WH2088> zeh will this לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu לְמוֹקֵ֔שׁ <WH4170> le-mo-Kesh, unto him How long shall this man be a snare שַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> shal-Lach go אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim, the men וְיַֽעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> ve-ya-'av-Du that they may serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their God הֲטֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> ha-Te-rem thou not yet תֵּדַ֔ע <WH3045> te-Da', knowest כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for אָבְדָ֖ה <WH6> 'a-ve-Dah is destroyed מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. that Egypt
